com.xrtb.nativeads.creative

Class NativeCreative

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xrtb.nativeads.creative.NativeCreative

  • public class NativeCreative
extends java.lang.Object
    The native part of a creative.
    Author:
    Ben M. Faul

    • Field Detail

      • assets

        public java.util.List<Asset> assets
        The assets that belong to this creative

      • link

        public Link link
        The link asset for this creative

      • imptrackers

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> imptrackers
        The impression trackers used by this creative

      • nativeAdType

        public java.lang.Integer nativeAdType
        The native ad type of this creative

      • dataMap

        public transient java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Entity> dataMap
        The data asset of this creative. Transient because in the campaign it is defined with all the assets in an array, but we will pull out img, video, link, and title so we can quickly find them later. Only data assets are in the array after it is encoded.

      • img

        public transient Asset img
        The img asset of this creative

      • video

        public transient Asset video
        The video asset of this creative. Transient because in the campaign it is defined with the assets array, but we will pull it out when the campaign is created so we can quickly find it later

      • title

        public transient Asset title
        The title asset of this creative. Transient because in the campaign it is defined with the assets array, but we will pull it out when the campaign is created so we can quickly find it later

      • callToAction

        public transient java.lang.String callToAction

    • Constructor Detail

      • NativeCreative

        public NativeCreative()
        An empty constructor for use by Jackson

    • Method Detail

      • encode

        public void encode()
        Pulls the image, video, link, and title assets out of the array and assigns them to objects. The data assets are assigned to a hashmap by type for fast lookup O(1) in the selection of creatives.

      • getEncodedAdm

        public java.lang.String getEncodedAdm(BidRequest br)
        Create the encoded native ADM from the assets of the creative matches with the assets of the bid request.
        Parameters:
        br - BidRequest. The bid request of this transaction
        Returns:
        String. The URI encoded string to use in the ADM field.
